title: What is the difference between Old and New GD? Explain to, basically, a non poster
body:
I'm just curious, as someone who rarely posted on the old forums, as to why the new boards are so bad. 
I personally dislike the look of boards and vastly prefer forums, but beyond that, I'm not sure what the large differences are

Please explain and pretend I am @RiotTamat

EDIT: As an addendum, I just read the Moderation post, and apparently expletives are ban worthy now? "If you call someone a fucking moron, you get banned, if you say 'I hate Teemos fucking mushrooms' you're *PROBABLY* fine"

Can this guy be any less professional? Does this count as being a jerk? Will I get banned now? I don't know, because as far as I can tell the rules are enforced on a case-by-case basis lmao
